The Chaos Emeralds are seven (sometimes six, sometimes eight) jewels that contain extraordinary power when used in unison, and that can be controlled using the Master Emerald. All eight gems were kept safe at a shrine in what would later be known as Mystic Ruins. They, and the chao creatures that lived at the shrine, came to be protected by Chaos, a chao that became a warm-hearted watery monster thanks to exposure to the Master Emerald. 4000 years before the present, the echidna Tikal was born. The daughter of the Chief Pachacamac, she was raised by her grandmother. After Grandma (that's what her people called her) died, Pachacamac became a power-hungry warlord, conquering nearby tribes in the name of his subjects. Tikal wasn't too happy about this. She befriended Chaos and the chao, her trusted her enough to show her the Emerald Shrine. Pachacamac learnt of this, and tried to steal the Emeralds. Seeing the chao hurt by Pachacamac's warriors, Chaos absorbed the power of the Seven Emeralds and killed Pachacamac, his people, and ruined their civilization. Tikal used the power of the Master Emerald to seal herself and Chaos inside of the jewel to prevent further destruction. The island on which the shrine existed was raised into the sky. The Chaos Emeralds dispersed elsewhere. Some members of the clan survived, and presumably lived in the ruins of their once great city. They made a mural depicting Chaos in his perfect form. Others lived on the floating Angel Island, protecting the Master Emerald so that Chaos could not be released. Thousands of years later, the United Federation has become one of, if not the, most powerful country on the planet. Gerald Robotnik, who studied Chaos and managed to create creatures based on him, was asked by the President to discover immortality. His granddaughter, Maria, was dying, so Gerald agreed to. He created a life-form named Shadow, thanks to the help of the alien Black Doom, who asked only that Shadow collect the Chaos Emeralds for him in return. However, the military saw Shadow as a threat, so all those involved in the project were killed or arrested. Maria herself was shot after helping Shadow escape to Earth, where he was captured anyway. The vengeful Gerald Robotnik managed to modify Shadow to seek revenge by collecting the Chaos Emeralds and using them to initiate a program that would send Space Colony ARK towards the Earth at far too great a velocity. Gerald was later executed, and Shadow locked away. Modern day; Gerald's grandson and Maria's cousin, Ivo Robotnik, plans to rule the world. He is stopped by Sonic the Hedgehog, and later his friend, Miles Prower. By this time, the guardians of the Master Emerald are all extinct except for one survivor, named Knuckles, who joins Sonic and Tails after Dr. Robotnik tried to trick him into collecting the Emeralds for him. The series explores several plotlines --- Dr. Robotnik finding stone tablets that told him about Chaos; Shadow being freed by Robotnik and using him to get Gerald's revenge for Maria's death; what happened to the ancient world after Pachacamac and his tribe's deaths; and the constant search for the Chaos Emeralds.
